subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Erin Thorn made three free throws in the final 16.3 seconds to help the host Liberty defeat the Minnesota Lynx, 71-66, and snap a season-high seven-game losing streak.
snippet: Erin Thorn made three free throws in the final 16.3 seconds to help the host Liberty defeat the Minnesota Lynx, 71-66, and snap a season-high seven-game losing streak.
